author: Amanda Watts and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
title: WHO defends coronavirus response after Trump criticism
description: The head of the World Health Organization on Wednesday defended the organization's response to the coronavirus pandemic, at one point directly responding to criticisms leveled by President Donald Trump.
content:
(CNN)The head of the World Health Organization on Wednesday defended the organization's response to the coronavirus pandemic, at one point directly responding to criticisms leveled by President Donald Trump.
